name: A Camping Night
description:
You as a boy scout decided to go camping. But what you didn't know is that the nights are dangerous over here. Monsters will try to devour you and your light. Try to fight them of with your cookie gun and don't let them extinguish your fire WASD to move and LEFT CLICK to shoot

This game was made for Trijam#198 in 3 hours. This was my first game made in such a short amount of time, I wasn't able to add many things I planned to, such as a few more features, lighting, animations and more sound effects. Though I am not satisfied with this game, I have learnt a lot in this journey
